Instruction: 'Cook the pasta according to the package instructions.'
In a pot of boiling water, blanch the frozen peas for 1-2 minutes, then drain.'
In a skillet, cook the bacon until crispy, then crumble it.'
In the same skillet, pour in the heavy cream and bring to a simmer.'
Stir in the cooked pasta, blanched peas, and crumbled bacon.'
Add Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.'
'Toss gently until the pasta is coated in the creamy sauce.'
Serve hot, garnished with extra Parmesan cheese if desired.'
